title: The Saint Is A Pervert, Where Is The Pure Love Route? (Her Maid Asks) - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Master-Servant Relationship   Oneshot   Perverted Protagonist   S*xual Abuse

description:
Recognized as a Saint from an early age, Lilith was forced to live an ascetic life as befitting her role. As a result, Lilith underwent a class change, from a Saint to a Pervert in Saint’s clothing.

This is the daily life of a Perverted Saint and her Maid.>
